name: The Request (Rom)
description:
You are Rom, a novice mage, tasked to find your fellow mages who went missing locating for the evil Lord Tarvos. Use your magic to get past obstacles and save your brethren.

(This is my first ever Unity project. I experimented with a couple of platformer-type mechanics and attempted to add a little originality in character, boss and aesthetic. I would like to expand on the world a little more but for now this is what I have)
